evidence.claim: StaffLink Outsourcing adheres to HIPAA guidelines in its operations, ensuring the protection of sensitive patient information.
The company has referenced X12 transaction sets for electronic data interchange in healthcare-related positions.
StaffLink discusses various compliance measures aligned with healthcare standards which suggest the use of health tech rails like FHIR and HL7 in their service.
Company mentions cloud infrastructure likely for storage and processing, but specifics are limited.

icp.icp_reason: No clear evidence of X12 transaction handling on the website.
